_header: Thy guilt is great and that is ruth
Title(s): ‘Rekewerynge is none and þat is trowthe’
_description: ‘Rekewerynge is none and þat is trowthe:’ the councillor’s reply to a friend in need — one couplet

BLRoy18Bxxiii.Transcription:
Thy gilte is grett & þat is rewtherekeuerynge is none &
                    þat is trowthe
BLRoy18Bxxiii.Editions:
Ross,  W. O.,
                        ed.  
             Middle English Sermons from British Museum MS. Royal 18 B.
                xxiii.
